patch: @@ -0,0 +1,94 @@ +{ + "id": "f60799ac-db3c-4ac2-97f9-0f9dbfcc060f", + "name": "Independent Projects #1", + "media": { + "url": "project://assets/level-4-independent-projects-1.png", + "type": "image" + }, + "title": "Independent Projects #1", + "language": "Python", + "vocabulary": "#include(course://vocabulary.json)", + "activities": {}, + "section_groups": [ + { + "id": "UUID", + "title": "PRACTICE PROBLEM", + "sections": [ + { + "id": "bd86ce78-8703-4769-9306-e48f0827e68d", + "title": "Practice Problem", + "steps": [ + { + "id": "32ef74ae-23f6-405f-8a01-b833256fe426", + "title": "#1", + "block_groups": [ + { + "id": "UUID", + "blocks": [ + { + "id": "40621208-0b8e-44d9-ab64-55dcabf305d3", + "type": "checkpoint", + "title": "Multiple Choice", + "variant": "multiple_choice", + "question": [ + { + "type": "text", + "text": "Which of these is a string method?" + } + ], + "choices": [ + { + "id": "ab263171-3585-441e-a30a-124bc2730f42", + "text": "print()", + "correct": false + }, + { + "id": "a6a46e9f-c7c5-4412-912a-50c48af50a39", + "text": "lower()", + "correct": true + }, + { + "id": "799b70e7-a99c-4495-ae8b-6c9e85ef1b4f", + "text": "choice()", + "correct": false + }, + { + "id": "de9c0aa5-a273-4de6-b850-cf82032826af", + "text": "lowercase()", + "correct": false + } + ] + } + ] + } + ] + } + ] + } + ] + } + ], + "scoring": { + "criteria": [ + { + "title": "Practice Problem", + "components": [ + { + "id": "40621208-0b8e-44d9-ab64-55dcabf305d3", + "type": "checkpoint", + "weight": 100 + } + ], + "contexts": [ + { + "type": "checkpoint", + "title": "Practice Problem", + "checkpoints": [ + "40621208-0b8e-44d9-ab64-55dcabf305d3" + ] + } + ] + } + ] + } +} \ No newline at end of file
